nodes.text: An outpost of the Hidden Hand crime syndicate was located on Heva. The arms dealer Wef sold weapons from the outpost.

At some point, the Melbu arms dealer Wef set up an outpost on the planet Heva and sold weapons to various clients, most notably the Hidden Hand crime syndicate. During their hunt for Vader in the Imperial Era, Beilert Valance and his crew of bounty hunters visited the outpost to use Wef's bot-drones against an Imperial Star Destroyer that they lured there.
